long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the latest technology news and news on gaming, mobile, apps, AR, VR, and more. Install the Techgenyz Chrome extension to stay updated.

Techgenyz - Technology News, Daily News Updates is developed for avid readers who want to stay updated with the latest happenings in the tech world without leaving their current website. With this, you'll get the news feed on trending technology news on the most recent mobile apps, gaming, and much more right sidebar of every site.

Techgenyz is trusted by millions of millennial readers who visit the website to get top technology breaking news, updates from big tech events, product launches, and more.

Sometimes, you might have to juggle between websites to get the day's top tech stories. It consumes a lot of your time—now no need to leave your current website for the tech news stories. Just click on the Techgenyz News Extension tab and get the snapshot of breaking tech headlines in a second.

With the Techgenyz extension, you'll get the top news from all the leading brands and innovations — all in a beautiful, image-rich experience. The extension brings you the latest technology news, startup stories, gaming news, product reviews, how-to guide, helpful content, and expert advice on the go. The Techgenyz news extension gives you access to business news, investing news, automobile news, app news, and more on your fingertip.

Latest technology news story for you:

Techgenyz developers spent hundreds of hours developing a Chrome Extension that gives you an ultimate user experience. The primary aim of the Techgenyz Extension is to provide the latest tech story in your current tab without visiting the website. The integration is so smooth that you can get real-time updates within a second when the stories get published on the Techgenyz website. Our developers have designed the extension in a way that when a new news item is posted on the website, it will instantly be updated.

Enhanced design: 

Design is ever evolving — so do we. We understand our readers prefer a clean and thoughtful design. Therefore we built the extension following the new design pattern with a friendly user interface and modern font, color, loader, and font size. You can get the news headlines of the topic you prefer the most from the menu bar. Another interesting feature is the dark mode - you can switch the theme to dark more with a single click. Just click on the extension to get the latest news sources from all over the world.

Track tech news or gaming news of your favorite brands:

Techgenyz news Chrome extension brings the most relevant news from the tech world about your favorite tech brands on the go and access it from any website. Get updates about the photo editor app, your favorite games, software updates, app updates, and more so that you can discover more about the stories that matter to you.

Stay up to date with the latest tech news: 

Never miss out on global trending news in the technology domain ever again. Techgenyz team work round the clock to bring stories that are worth reading. The Techgenyz news extension is updated in real-time and displays news on the timeline when it is reported. We have designed our new extension that showcases a catchy headline and features images - so that you can take a glimpse of daily news in a short time.

Discover tech news stories from anywhere 

Our team covers news stories that matter in the technology & startup industry, reviews tech products, and gives opinions and analyses on new launches. Our team of curious journalists, writers, and contributors track all the top sources, including other news sites, tweets, Reddit posts, and forums, to cover news stories for our readers of the latest updates in the tech industry.

What's new? 

    ● We have re-designed the Techgenyz news extension with a new look
    ● New card design pattern which gives you a seamless experience
    ● Modern font, typefaces, color - overall, a beautiful design
    ● Load more options to read more stories you like
    ● Category-wise news segmentation – choose the topic you like
    ● Enhanced functionality to get more details about Techgenyz
    ● You can now switch the theme to dark more with a single click

The Techgenyz news extension is the best way to get breaking tech news on your mobile phone. Techgenyz is one of the most acceptable sources of stories about startup news, gadgets news, mobile news, software news, apps, future tech, and more.

Join our community to contribute articles to our website. Techgenyz empowers people and helps more truly connected lives with the most meaningful information for our lives - you can access global, relevant news stories with just a tap.

Install the Techgenyz Chrome extension and get updates directly from your browser. We scour the internet and find the best tech news world for you.

About Techgenyz:

Techgenyz is a leading source of the latest technology news, updates on future tech stories, and reports on Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, gaming, apps, and more. Get breaking tech news on Artificial Intelligence, IoT, smart devices, and digital assistant, shaping the daily life of connecting generations. Our community connects millions of readers across the globe with the latest news and daily news summary right at their fingertips.

Are we missing anything? Do you want us to add a new feature? We'll be happy to hear from you. Please let us know your feedback on the extension of Techgenyz - Technology News, Daily News Updates. Please email us at contact@techgenyz.com.

Download our Android app and keep track of the latest stories in the tech world. You can follow us on Google News and social media to never miss an update.
